User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography or description of the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a text-based post in the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Post entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who created the Post.

username.description: Username of the user who created the post.

userProfileUrl.description: URL of the profile picture of the user who posted.

content.description: The main content of the post.

tags.description: A list of tags categorizing the post.

upvotes.description: An array of user IDs who have upvoted the post.

comments.description: An array of comment objects on the post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the post was created.

cashAppName.description: The Cash App name of the user.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number for other payment apps.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Represents a comment on a Post.

userId.description: Reference to the User who posted the comment.

username.description: Username of the user who posted the comment.

userProfileUrl.description: Profile picture of the user who posted the comment.

text.description: The text content of the comment.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the comment was created.

definition.description: Stores all posts. This top-level collection allows for easy querying of all posts for the main feed.
